welcome_benefits: 2,000 bonus RP on the first transaction within 30 days from card issuance

Movie & Dining: BOGO offer on movie tickets up to ₹200 via BookMyShow
Rewards Rate: 2 RP for every ₹100 spent online; 1 RP for every ₹100 spent on in-store purchases
Reward Redemption: All the RP can be redeemed for vouchers and gift cards on RBL Rewards Portal; 1 RP = ₹0.25
Travel: Complimentary railway lounge access once every quarter

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% waiver up to ₹100 on transactions between ₹400 to ₹5,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the cash amount or a minimum of ₹500

product_details: Buy-one-get-one-free offer on movie tickets via BookMyShow.
NCMC features quick payments at metro stations and bus terminals.
This card can be easily linked with UPI for easy transactions.
Milestone benefits worth 2,000 Reward Points are included with this card.
